page.title: 17THE LIFE OF A 9 YEAR OLD
page.content: My name is Darren Crush. I like to play football, cricket and watch TV. My Mum used to be a nurse but then she retired and became a nurse in the Harlaxton Manor. My Father used to be in the RAF but he retired early and started to work for the Welbys and now he is a land agent. I have two sisters called Emma and Carrie. My house has six rooms, 3 bedrooms one kitchen and a lounge. Our house looks very old my Dad said it is five hundred years old. It is made of old stone. We have central heating in every room. In the morning I wake up and go to the toilet, wash and brush my teeth and have my breakfast. I get dressed the get ready for school. I play outside then when the bell goes we go inside and get our homework marked and have a quiet reading session.
